channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 04:42 Alarm lifted in Cherkasy region. Follow further messages.
item.description: 游릭 04:42 Alarm lifted in Cherkasy region. Follow further messages. #Cherkasy_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游댮 22:02 Threat of artillery shelling! Now there is artillery shelling in the Chervonohryhorivska territorial community. Take cover!
item.description: 游댮 22:02 Threat of artillery shelling! Now there is artillery shelling in the Chervonohryhorivska territorial community. Take cover! #Chervonohryhorivska_territorial_community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游댮 22:00 Threat of artillery shelling! Now in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community there is artillery shelling. Go to shelter!
item.description: 游댮 22:00 Threat of artillery shelling! Now in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community there is artillery shelling. Go to shelter! #city_of_Nikopol_and_the_Nikopol_territorial_community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
